title: Cornell University T-Shirt - Unique Inline Type
content:
Hello,

My boss has lost the screen for one of our T-shirts, and he needs me to remake it in Adobe Illustrator. I was not the original creator of the design, and I'm stumped as to what fonts are used. The bottom one "University" looks like a typical varsity font, but the top one is giving me trouble. I tried to clean up the image in Photoshop and use whatfontis.com, but my graphic-art skills are limited, and I had no luck. If anyone could identify this font for me, or suggest a close alternative, I'd be most grateful. Cheers!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bighittersmall_6430.jpg)

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: clesko

comments.content:
Tweak the proportions and, in some cases, the length of the arms of the C, and you could add the rules to any one of these:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/headlined-solid/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/headlined-solid/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/headlined-solid/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator-deluxe/heavy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator-deluxe/heavy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator-deluxe/heavy/")  
 [http://www.fontspace.com/justme54s/face-off-m54](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/www.fontspace.com/justme54s/face-off-m54 "http://www.fontspace.com/justme54s/face-off-m54")

My best guess for UNIVERSITY:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/febrotesk-4f/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/febrotesk-4f/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/febrotesk-4f/")

Both look like [Agency](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Agency) and possibly [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency) version if you'd like to get different variations in weight and width.
Ryuk, Agency is a much better match for UNIVERSITY, not so much for CORNELL.

Could be my eyes but looks like [Agency](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225/http:/myfonts.us/td-PMl5UZ) Bold (or Black), manually outline three times...  
Quick mock-up using Agency Bold only for both 'CORNELL' and 'UNIVERSITY'

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061225im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_6538.png)
Much thanks to both of you!
